subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
College Athletics
Halls of Fame
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: At 86, John Gagliardi is stepping down after 64 seasons as a college football coach, 60 of them at St. John’s University in Collegeville, Minn.
snippet: At 86, John Gagliardi is stepping down after 64 seasons as a college football coach, 60 of them at St. John’s University in Collegeville, Minn.
